Elevate your browsing experience with ChromaPredict, the innovative Chrome extension designed to effortlessly predict and suggest harmonious color schemes. Whether you're a web designer, digital artist, or simply someone who appreciates visually pleasing content, ChromaPredict is your go-to tool for easy color prediction.

Key Features:

Instant Color Suggestions:
Receive real-time color suggestions with a single click. ChromaPredict analyzes the current webpage or selected elements, providing you with a curated palette that complements the existing colors seamlessly.

Intuitive Color Wheel:
Explore the vast spectrum of colors through an intuitive and user-friendly color wheel. Easily navigate and experiment with different hues, shades, and tones to find the perfect combination for your project.

Responsive Design Integration:
Tailored for web designers, ChromaPredict seamlessly integrates with your design workflow. Preview how suggested color schemes would look on various devices and screen sizes to ensure a consistent and appealing user experience.

Customizable Palettes:
Save and organize your favorite color palettes for quick access. ChromaPredict allows you to build your own collection of harmonious colors, making it easy to maintain a consistent aesthetic across different projects.

Accessibility Insights:
Ensure your designs are accessible to all users with ChromaPredict's accessibility feature. Receive recommendations for color combinations that meet accessibility standards, promoting inclusivity in your designs.

Real-Time Color Grading:
Fine-tune your color choices in real-time with ChromaPredict's live color grading feature. Witness instant updates and adjustments as you modify color parameters, allowing you to achieve the perfect visual balance effortlessly.
